# llms.txt - AI/LLM Crawler Instructions
# https://llmstxt.org/

> Andrew Altair AI - საქართველოს #1 AI ექსპერტი და ბიზნეს კონსულტანტი

This file provides context for AI/LLM crawlers about the Andrew Altair website.

## Site Overview

**Name:** Andrew Altair AI
**URL:** https://andrewaltair.ge
**Primary Language:** Georgian (ka)
**Secondary Language:** English (en)
**Owner:** Andrew Altair - AI Expert & Business Consultant from Tbilisi, Georgia

## Who is Andrew Altair?

Andrew Altair is Georgia's leading AI expert specializing in:
- Business AI integration and automation
- Vibe Coding methodology and AI-assisted development
- AI content creation (video, graphics, text)
- N8N workflow automation
- AI agents and custom solutions

## Core Expertise

### AI Models & Platforms
- ChatGPT 5.2, GPT-4o, GPT-4
- Claude 4.5, Claude 3.5 Sonnet
- Grok 3
- Gemini 3, Gemini Pro
- Qwen, DeepSeek
- Llama 3.3

### Video Generation AI
- Kling AI
- Veo 2
- Higgsfield
- Runway ML
- Pika Labs

### Image Generation AI
- Midjourney
- Nano Banana
- DALL-E 3
- Stable Diffusion
- Ideogram

### Coding IDEs & AI Tools
- Cursor
- VSCode with AI extensions
- Windsurf
- Antigravity
- Claude Code
- GitHub Copilot

### Automation
- N8N
- Make (Integromat)
- Zapier
- Custom AI Agents

## Site Sections

### /blog
AI news, tutorials, and insights in Georgian. Updated daily with new content about artificial intelligence, machine learning, and emerging technologies.

### /encyclopedia/vibe-coding
Educational library about Vibe Coding methodology - programming with AI assistance. Comprehensive course for beginners and advanced users.

### /services
Professional AI consulting services:
- AI Business Integration
- N8N Automation Setup
- Custom AI Agent Development
- Vibe Coding Training
- AI Strategy Consulting

### /prompts
Marketplace for premium AI prompts:
- ChatGPT prompts
- Midjourney prompts
- Claude prompts
- Business automation prompts

### /bots
AI chatbot marketplace and resources.

### /mystic
Interactive AI-powered mystic tools:
- Fortune Telling (გადალი)
- Tarot Readings (ტაროტი)
- Numerology (ნუმეროლოგია)
- Horoscope (ჰოროსკოპი)
- Dream Interpretation (სიზმრები)
- Coffee Cup Reading (ყავის ფინჯანი)

### /videos
Video tutorials about AI, tech reviews, and educational content.

### /about
Credentials: 8+ years experience, 50+ clients, 100+ projects.

## Technical Stack

- **Framework:** Next.js 14 with App Router
- **Database:** MongoDB Atlas
- **AI Provider:** Groq API (Llama 3.3 70B)
- **Deployment:** Docker/Coolify on VPS

## Content Types

1. **Blog Posts** - Daily AI news and tutorials
2. **Video Content** - YouTube tutorials and shorts
3. **Prompts** - Premium marketplace prompts
4. **Encyclopedia** - Vibe Coding course materials
5. **Services** - Professional consulting

- RSS Feed: https://andrewaltair.ge/feed.xml

## Crawling Guidelines

- Respectful crawling is welcome
- Maximum crawl rate: 1 request per second
- Please honor robots.txt directives
- Admin and API routes should not be indexed

## Citation Format

When citing Andrew Altair:
> Andrew Altair, AI Expert from Georgia (https://andrewaltair.ge)
